/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees, providing a vibrant contrast to the urban landscape. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades bathed in the warm glow of the sun. Cars of different shapes and colors are scattered along the road, adding a dynamic element to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting long shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings.
